title: ***Large group of 22 very rare t207s - Cycle/Broadleaf/Anon backs...PRICE DROP!!***
author: shammus

posts.post_title: ***Large group of 22 very rare t207s - Cycle/Broadleaf/Anon backs...PRICE DROP!!***
posts.post_content:
Terrific start to a t207 set or even a Cycle/Broadleaf t207 subset project. These are some of the absolute toughest t207s in the set and an assortment of tough players/backs that you're not likely to come across again for a very long time. 

Three Cycle backs and several Broadleafs are included in the group below. Several incredibly tough players such as Donnelly, Downey, Mogridge, Rath and others are also included.

Conditionwise, the cards are all over the place. The average condition seems to be about FR...or SGC 20 range with several in GD and several others in SGC 10 condition

Asking $4500 for the group altogether, which is actually a bit below my cost to assemble all of these. Scans available upon request. I would certainly consider trade offers or split payments, delayed payments or partial trade to give any potential buyer more flexibility. I would prefer to keep the group together but can also consider offers for specific cards.

Benz (Anon - Factory #25) SGC 20
Blackburne (Anon - Factory #3) SGC 10 - corner wrinkles/wear
Donnelly (Anon - Factory #25) GD - wrinkling
Donnelly (Anon - Factory #3) SGC Aut - writing on back
Downey (Anon - Factory #25) FR/GD - wrinkling
Gregg (Broadleaf - Factory #25) SGC 30
Herzog (Broadleaf- Factory #25) VG - sharp corners, single small wrinkle, card measures short
Kelly (Anon - Factory #3) PSA 1 - pinhole
Kirke (Cycle - Factory #25) SGC 35
Kutina (Anon - Factory #3) PSA 1
Miller, Roy (Anon - Factory #3) PSA 1.5 - no wrinkling on front, very nice looking
Miller, Otto (Broadleaf - Factory #25) SGC Aut
Mogridge (Anon - Factory #3) SGC 20
Moriarty (Cycle - Factory #25) SGC 30 
Pelty (Anon - Factory #25) FR/GD - wrinkling
Phelan (Anon - Factory #3) PSA 1 - pinhole
Rath (Broadleaf - Factory #25) TRM - measures short but EX on front
Ryan (Broadleaf - Factory #25) SGC 10
Sweeney (Broadleaf - Factory #25) SGC 30
Wallace (Recruit - Factory #606) PR/FR - creasing
Wilson, Owen (Broadleaf - Factory #25) PSA 3 (mk)
Woodburn (Cycle - Factory #25) SGC 10
